message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value and the benefits it offers, I'm asking for $12,000. I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but given my budget constraints, I am only willing to pay up to $10,000 for the product. I believe we can come to an agreement within this range.
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $12,000 is already a competitive price for this product and its potential value to you.  Perhaps we can meet in the middle? How about $11,000?
Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product, but I would like to stay within my budget. Could we perhaps agree on $10,500?
